original_title: Treno di parole, viaggio nella poesia di Raffaello Baldini
overview: The Å“uvre of poet Raffaello Baldini (1924-2005) through the words of those who knew him, the poems he himself read, the fragments of his monologues, his beloved Romagna landscapes.
title: Treno di parole, viaggio nella poesia di Raffaello Baldini
